content_request: je veux le CA des recharges

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    rcm.year AS year,
    rcm.month AS month,
    SUM(rcm.ca_recharges) AS ca_recharges
FROM
    reporting_ca_monthly AS rcm
WHERE rcm.year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
GROUP BY
    rcm.year,
    rcm.month
ORDER BY
    rcm.year DESC,
    rcm.month DESC;
